name: Tile
0:
”Alexa, find my keys.”
”Alexa, locate my wallet.”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tile
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Tile’s lost and found network. Tile keeps track of your things so you can stay on top of your day. Tile trackers come in multiple shapes that you can attach to your things and our free Tile app finds your things nearby and far away. The Tile skill is compatible with all Tile hardware models and any Tile-enabled partner products. 

Tile is supported by Find My with Alexa. After you have activated your Tiles, complete these three steps in the Alexa app:
 1. Enable the Tile skill and set up your Tile devices - please make sure you grant the Device Address permission to the Tile skill
 2. Go to “Devices > Trackers” to enable Find My with Alexa
 3. Select and save the Tiles you want to find with Alexa
Once finished, you can simply say things like “Alexa, find my keys” or “Alexa, ring my backpack”.

Tile now works with Amazon Sidewalk. Supported Echo devices that are opted into Sidewalk are now able to securely locate Tiles using Sidewalk’s BLE spectrum, improving the overall Tile finding experience.
 1. Alexa will also provide -when available- the location of the Echo device that has seen your Tile recently, providing a more specific location for your lost item.
 2. If you leave the house without your Tile, your connected Echo device will provide you the most up-to-date location of your Tile in the Tile app, so you can have peace of mind knowing where it is.

In order to ensure your Tiles work with Sidewalk, please make sure that: 
 * Sidewalk and Community Finding are enabled under account settings in the Alexa app
 * Your Tile skill is granted the ‘Device Address’ permission when setting up your skill (or in the Alexa app go to ‘Your Skills’, click on the Tile skill Settings and Grant the Device Address permission to the skill)
